vlive.korean: 리노는 귀여워가 아니라 리노는 겁쟁이인데? It's not "LEE KNOW is cute" but "LEE KNOW is a scaredy-cat". 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [SKZ VLOG] 리노 : 리노, 하고 싶은 거 다 하지 마
vlive.english: It's not "LEE KNOW is cute" but "LEE KNOW is a scaredy-cat".
